statements: SELECT * FROM GenderEqualityAnalysis WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT gender, discrimination_score FROM GenderEqualityAnalysis WHERE year = 2021;
SELECT country, year, discrimination_type FROM GenderEqualityAnalysis WHERE discrimination_score > 0.75;
SELECT country, gender, discrimination_type, discrimination_score FROM GenderEqualityAnalysis WHERE year = 2020 ORDER BY discrimination_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM GenderEqualityAnalysis WHERE discrimination_type = 'Pay Gap' AND country = 'Canada';
SELECT country, year, gender, discrimination_type, discrimination_score FROM GenderEqualityAnalysis WHERE country = 'USA' ORDER BY year DESC
SELECT gender, AVG(discrimination_score) AS avg_score FROM GenderEqualityAnalysis WHERE year BETWEEN 2015 AND 2020 GROUP BY gender
SELECT country, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM GenderEqualityAnalysis WHERE discrimination_score > 0.5 GROUP BY country ORDER BY total_records DESC
SELECT gender, discrimination_type, MAX(discrimination_score) AS max_score FROM GenderEqualityAnalysis GROUP BY gender, discrimination_type HAVING MAX(discrimination_score) > 0.8
SELECT * FROM GenderEqualityAnalysis WHERE discrimination_score < 0.3 OR (country = 'France' AND discrimination_type = 'Gender Pay Gap') ORDER BY year ASC
SELECT * FROM GenderEqualityData WHERE country='USA';
SELECT id, country, year, gender FROM GenderEqualityData ORDER BY year DESC;
SELECT AVG(equality_score) AS avg_score FROM GenderEqualityData WHERE gender='female';
SELECT country, SUM(discrimination_count) AS total_discrimination FROM DiscriminationStats GROUP BY country ORDER BY total_discrimination DESC;
SELECT gender, COUNT(*) AS gender_count FROM GenderEqualityData GROUP BY gender;
SELECT * FROM GenderEqualityData WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT country, equality_score FROM GenderEqualityData WHERE year = 2021;
SELECT discrimination_type, SUM(discrimination_count) AS total_count FROM DiscriminationStats GROUP BY discrimination_type ORDER BY total_count DESC;
SELECT country, year, equality_score FROM GenderEqualityData WHERE equality_score > 70 AND year BETWEEN 2018 AND 2020 ORDER BY equality_score DESC;

SELECT country, year, discrimination_type, discrimination_count FROM DiscriminationStats JOIN GenderEqualityData ON DiscriminationStats.country = GenderEqualityData.country ORDER BY year, discrimination_count DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM gender_equality;
SELECT country, equality_score FROM gender_equality;
SELECT gender, COUNT(*) AS count FROM gender_equality GROUP BY gender ORDER BY count DESC;
SELECT discrimination_type, reported_date FROM discrimination_cases WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT violation_type, victim_name, report_date FROM human_rights_violations WHERE country = 'Canada';
SELECT * FROM gender_equality ORDER BY equality_score DESC, country ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT country, COUNT(DISTINCT gender) AS num_genders FROM gender_equality GROUP BY country HAVING num_genders > 1;
SELECT * FROM discrimination_cases WHERE discrimination_type = 'Racial Discrimination' OR discrimination_type = 'Gender Discrimination' ORDER BY reported_date DESC;
SELECT violation_id, country, violation_type, victim_name FROM human_rights_violations WHERE violation_type LIKE '%Arbitrary%' ORDER BY violation_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT country, MAX(equality_score) AS max_equality_score FROM gender_equality GROUP BY country ORDER BY max_equality_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM gender_equality_data;
SELECT country, year, indicator FROM gender_equality_data WHERE country = 'United States';
SELECT MAX(value) AS max_value FROM gender_equality_data WHERE year = 2021;
SELECT index_name, index_value FROM gender_indices WHERE year = 2022 ORDER BY index_value DESC;
SELECT violation_description, violation_date, country FROM human_rights_violations WHERE country = 'France' ORDER BY violation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM gender_equality_data ORDER BY country ASC, year DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT country, indicator, year FROM gender_equality_data WHERE value > 50 ORDER BY year ASC
SELECT country, COUNT(*) AS num_cases FROM discrimination_cases GROUP BY country HAVING num_cases > 5 ORDER BY num_cases DESC
SELECT * FROM gender_indices WHERE index_value BETWEEN 0.5 AND 1.0 AND year = 2020
SELECT country, violation_description FROM human_rights_violations WHERE status = 'ongoing' ORDER BY country
SELECT * FROM gender_equality_facts ORDER BY country, year DESC;
SELECT id, country, indicator, value FROM gender_equality_facts WHERE value > 50;
SELECT report_id, author, report_date FROM gender_equality_reports WHERE author = 'John Doe';
SELECT org_name, headquarters_address FROM human_rights_organizations WHERE org_type = 'Non-Profit';
SELECT case_title, case_description, country FROM discrimination_cases WHERE country IN ('USA', 'Canada', 'UK') ORDER BY case_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM gender_equality_facts WHERE country = 'USA' AND year = 2021
SELECT AVG(value) AS avg_value, MAX(value) AS max_value FROM gender_equality_facts WHERE indicator = 'gender_pay_gap'
SELECT country, SUM(value) FROM gender_equality_facts GROUP BY country ORDER BY country ASC
SELECT * FROM discrimination_cases WHERE case_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' AND country = 'France'

SELECT org_name, org_type, COUNT(*) AS total_cases FROM human_rights_organizations JOIN discrimination_cases ON human_rights_organizations.org_id = discrimination_cases.org_id GROUP BY org_name, org_type ORDER BY total_cases DESC
